attributes.action: Implement a tougher sentence for people that choose to attack police officers
attributes.additional_details: It is concerning the way the above is going . It seems as though the attackers have more right than the police officers and this shift in relationship puts a weakness on our police officers to serve the community appropriately
attributes.background: Address the sentencing that is given to people that attack police officers. The police are pulled to task when they make a decision to use a taser or any other form of defence . More attacks on officers are reported and I believe this is due to the lack of consequence for the Attackers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332844
